name: sibilant

making a s or sh sound: a sibilant whisper
More examplesFewer examplesShe could hear the sibilant trickle of water.His voice was as sibilant as a snake's.

a s or sh sound: The microphone exaggerates every sibilant.
More examplesFewer examplesIn rapid speech, the verb loses its initial sibilant.Even with my hearing aids, I struggle to hear sibilants.
